string.value: #b#eTitle Challenge - Celebrity#n\n#kA title given to those who increase their popularity by 1,000 within the 30 day time limit. I should talk to Dalair and try out for the #e#bCelebrity#n#k Medal.

#b#eTitle Challenge - Celebrity#n
#k - Time Left : #Qdaylimit#Days #Qhourlimit#Hours #Qminlimit#Minutes
 - Popularity Level : #b#jpopgap##k / #jpopG#
 #jgaugePop# #jperPop# %

#b#eTitle Challenge - Celebrity#n
#k - Time Left : #Qdaylimit#Days #Qhourlimit#Hours #Qminlimit#Minutes
 - Popularity Level : #b#jpopgap##k / #jpopG#
 #jgaugePop# #jperPop# %

I raised my popularity by 1,000 within 30 days! Even Dalair seemed surprised by it, and he gave me the '#bCelebrity#k' title. Ha, maybe I should try out for the '#bMaple Idol Star#k' medal now.
In order to earn the Celebrity title, you must raise 1,000 popularity points within a given time. If you think that's too hard, why don't you quit and try for another title?
